#include<stdio.h>


int morethan2[200];

int main()
{
    int t, n, m, i, j;
    int a, b;

    int answer;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for( j = 0; j < t; j++ )
    {
        memset(morethan2,0,200);
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        for(; m > 0; m-- )
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
            morethan2[a-1] = morethan2[a-1] + 1;
            morethan2[b-1] = morethan2[b-1] + 1;
        }
        answer = 1;
        for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
        {
            if ( morethan2[i]%2 != 0 )
            {
                answer = 0;
                break;
            }
        }
        if ( answer == 1)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
}
